alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam; Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:27AM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut, northeast New Jersey and southeast New York. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning or evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam; Rockland; Southern Westchester
